body.name: Mounting Dream TV Wall Mount Swivel and Tilt for Most 26-55 Inch TV, TV Mount Perfect Center Design, Full Motion TV Mount Bracket with Articulation, up to VESA 400x400mm, 60 lbs, MD2377

features: [Perfect centered design] TV wall bracket fits for most of 26-55 inch OLED/LED/Plasma TVs up to 60 LBS, with max VESA of 400 x 400mm/mounting holes spacing. Please refer to detailed information on the product description to see if this TV wall mounts fits your TV from the following aspects: TV VESA and weight, wood stud location and possible blocked input.

[Flexible] with full motion TV wall mount, your TV can be easily adjusted to desired angle and distance to provide comfortable viewing: tilt the TV 5° up and 15° down to reduce glare, swivel the TV left or right according to your seat. Pull out to 17.1” and retract back to 3.1”, making your TV alive to move. +/-3° post-installation adjustment allows for perfect TV leveling.

[Easy installation] TV mount with decent instruction and full range of hardware are packed in pre-labeled bags. We also offer cable ties and bubble level. Additional concrete anchors are available through Mounting Dream team(Concrete Anchor Size: φ10x50mm). All our TV brackets can not be installed on drywall alone.
[Safety & Stability] Technology of robot welding makes the whole TV mounting bracket unit sturdy and safe. US base customer service is available if any concerns.

[Protected by Amazon Transparency] Verifies each unit’s authenticity and enables you to view rich information about the product you purchased such as brand story, product features, installation instructions.

MD2377 TV Mount Installation Video Guide This tv wall mount fits for wood studs or concrete wall installation only, not for drywall. (Notice: The required anchors for concrete wall installation are not included in package to avoid any misuse. Anchor Size: φ10x50mm)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 11, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Outstanding Quality, Easy Install, Great Value
reviews.reviewText: It is rare these days to find products of this high quality at a true value price! I was so impressed with the quality, ease of installation, and excellent strength and functionality of this product that I ordered another one to replace an existing (lesser quality) mount. From my experience with both purchases, The Mounting Dream company exemplifies excellent quality control demonstrated by both products being received in a sturdy product box, factory tape sealed. Instructions are thorough and easy. All necessary hardware is supplied including numerous spacers to answer almost any tolerance situation (were not even needed in my casde but very handy should one need them). The design of this mount is among the best imo as it allows lateral movement of the TV after installation for better centering on the wall if pulled away from the wall or angled in varioius positions. Adjusting angle and tilt is easy and secure. The installation is quite simple and an important tip is use the included level (or you own) to be sure everything is level. A convenient and helpful mounting template is included that makes installation even easier. The lag bolts are fine only I used slightly shorter/slightly larger diameter ones; but the ones included certainly suffice only I found it a bit easier to drive a slightly shorter one all the way into the stud using slightly shorter lag bolts; avoiding the chance of overstressing the head of the longer lag bolts included. Just pre drill the holes into the wall/stud. IMPORTANT-Definitely DO NOT use power drivers to power drive in the lag bolts as that could cause too much torque leading to bolt fracture. AS STATED IN THE INSTRUCTIONS, Install lag bolts only by using a manual hand tool and a ratchet and socket or socket driver work far better and easier than a Phillips screwdriver. to install lag bolts. This company is reputable based on the product quality and quality control measures taken in packaging. If you are looking for an excellent, easy to install, highly versatile and functional TV mount for a great price and appreciate excellent packaging, instructions, customer support contact info, etc., you found it with Mounting Dream. My guess is the other products Mounting Dream offer are comparable in terms of quality and value. Since often reviews can all to often be fake, please be assured that this review is my honest opinion based on experience from purchasing two units. I have not been contacted or offered anything for this review and would never partake in such activities which I feel have potential to only mislead the consumer. You can trust in this review as I rarely write reviews, but when a product comes along that is this satisfying and noteworthy, then I believe the product and company deserve noteworthy recognition. Hopefully more companies will follow suit with this level of all aroundbar setting quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Top Quality TV Wall Mount
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for our 42" TV and I am very happy with my purchase! The instructions are clear, step by step and the product is packaged with all parts separately packaged to easily select what you need. The mount is solid quality, great flexibility to tilt and move into any position you need. Installation was a snap and I installed everything in 30 minutes by myself, including hanging the TV! The price is excellent and I've seen mounts not nearly this quality for double the cost or more!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The TV Wall Mount Swivel from Amazon is a fantastic addition to my home. Its sturdy construction holds my TV securely and allows for flexible viewing angles with the swivel feature. Installation was straightforward, and it comes with all the necessary hardware. This mount maximizes space and enhances the overall aesthetics of my room. A great investment for any TV enthusiast.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install very good
reviews.reviewText: Amazing, easy to install with a drill of course, everything you need is in the box, you have so many choices to move it everywhere, love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 22, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Really good, easy-to-install product
reviews.reviewText: Needed an articulated wall mount for a 43" TV. Looked at a bunch and dismissed them due to either price, design or what appeared to be cheap quality materials. This one checked all the boxes for a TV of that size: single stud mount, big range of motion, extended quite a way from the wall, and, according to other reviewers, quality materials/construction and easy installation.It delivered on every one of those things, including the fact that the design of the part that mounts to the wall, the way the arm folds, and the template provided made it one of the easiest wall mount installs I've done (which is something like 6-8 now). And the adjustment options for tilt, etc are basic but well-designed.Would have given it 4.5 stars if I could but a couple small "cons":- Explanation of which screws/hardware to use on the back of the TV (to attach the mounting brackets) was a little lacking. I'd done this before, but if I had no experience, I could see where the instructions would have seemed lacking at that point.- Instructions around Step 2 could have been more clear. Didn't bother me, but if someone wasn't familiar with this stuff they might have had to read things a few times about drywall vs. concrete wall install info.- The unit was very stiff when trying to move it. I fixed this by slightly - and I very slightly - loosening the nuts on the bolts (at the points where the articulated arm bends). Definitely wouldn't want to over-loosen those for a couple reasons, but it was so stiff out of the box that it would have been pretty difficult to move the arm around when everything was mounted.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Find a stud and your set!
reviews.reviewText: Mounting Dream by far Best Price & Value of any TV mounting brackets out there.Hands down Supper easy to install (find your stud) great motion, fits all patterns.Fast delivery, easy instructions, highly recommend this company.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sturdy mount.
reviews.reviewText: A co-worker bought these for our bunk rooms in each of the Captain's rooms at our 4 stations and I liked the range of motion, and sturdiness of them to the point where I ordered the same one for my tv at home. At work, we just leave the part screwed to the back of our tvs, leave the wall portion in the room, and use it at the next station we move to each year. The posterboard guide made drilling the holes super easy, and I kind of did it without reading the instructions. (I did go back afterwards to verify I did it right to avoid it crashing down later)I like that I have a 50" tv at work and it can come out far enough to easily connect/disconnect cables from it with ease. It has bolts that screw in to prevent it sliding/lifting off the mount accidentally and plenty of adjustment screws to give you the viewing angle you want.Just a solid mount.

Excelente calidad de los materiales. Muy resistente. Trae instructivo bastante claro y lo mejor que trae todas las piezas necesarias para adaptarse al televisor que sea. Anteriormente había comprado un soporte de otra marca y no contaba con los tornillo que mi TV necesitaba. Un plus que traiga con un pequeño nivel y velcro para cables. 10 de 10.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a great product and I would highly recommend. Thanks

reviews.reviewTitle: High quality, great price and easy to install, a real winner!
reviews.reviewText: This mount arrived on time just after the Easter holidays. It was well packed, with every conceivable screw and fitting for a wide range of TVs. Instructions were clear and easy to follow. It even included a sprit level to ensure correct installation. I am typically very cautious and slow with the installation of new equipment, but the installation went very easily and took less than 30 minutes, It was not difficult to achieve a secure mounting to the wall stud. I was a little concerned that the mount would not be strong enough, with 3 screws in line on a single stud, to provide a secure installation when I swivelled the TV off centre, but I need not had worried - this is a very solid installation.I was very impressed with the high quality of the mount. My TV, a 49 inch Toshiba, was very easy for me to fit, singlehanded, onto the mount, which provides an angular adjustment to correct for any vertical misalignment of the mounting plate on the stud up to 3 degrees. I didn’t need this because it was not difficult to mount the bracket so that it was vertical. The TV can be moved along the mounting rail to enable it to be positioned at right angles to the wall when it is pulled to maximum extension. Rotating the TV on the bracket is easy, and the swivel arm is very solid and strong.Before I bought this mount I looked at several others. I was swayed into selecting this unit by the huge number of 5 and 4 star reviews. Having bought and installed it I find myself joining the 5 star group. I think the high quality and low price make this mount a real bargain and would have no hesitation in buying another.
Started sagging within a week of installation. Had to replace it. It was installed exactly as per instructions.( My TV weighed only 12 kgs.)

reviews.reviewTitle: Amazing value and super easy to put together and mount
reviews.reviewText: Awesome mount, it comes with so many different sized bolts to accomodate many different styles of tv, it’s easy to put together and the range it has means it can be mounted pretty much anywhere
